title: R&D Areas
subtitle: Pushing the boundaries of technology through focused research and development

robotics.title: Robotics
robotics.description: Design and development of autonomous ground vehicles, mobile robots, and mechanical systems for harsh environments and complex tasks.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Machine learning, computer vision, and intelligent control systems for autonomous decision-making and environmental perception.

embedded.title: Embedded Systems
embedded.description: Real-time control systems, sensor integration, and low-level programming for robotics applications and autonomous platforms.
